get.description:
The layers endpoint provides a service for querying Lifemapper 
environmental layers that match a set of query parameters.

200.description: A list of environmental layers that match the specified criteria

parameters.name: epsgCode
parameters.description: The EPSG code for the layer

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A short name for the layer

parameters.name: isCategorical
parameters.description: An indicator if this layer is categorical or not (1=yes, 0=no)

parameters.name: envLayerTypeId
parameters.description: The type code id for this layer

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to add to the layer

parameters.name: envLayerType
parameters.description: The type code for this layer

parameters.name: valUnits
parameters.description: The units for the values in each cell (such as degreesCelsius)

parameters.name: gcmCode
parameters.description: GCM

parameters.name: alternatePredictionCode
parameters.description: Alternate prediction code

parameters.name: dateCode
parameters.description: Date code

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The layer content as a file

400.description: Error status returned when there is a problem with the user inputs

get.description:
The environmental layers count service endpoint provides a service for
returning the number of environmental layers that match a set of query
parameters.

200.description: A count of environmental layers matching the criteria
Layer object in specified format

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to access an environmental layer

404.description: Error status thrown when the requested environmental layer was not found

delete.summary: Delete a layer that you own

204.description: Returns an OK response that a layer is deleted

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to delete an environmental layer

404.description: Error status thrown when the requested environmental layer was not found

get.description:
The Global PAM endpoint allows a user to query all of the completed 
PAMs that the user has access to to find those that match their query
parameters.

200.description: Returns a list of matching PAVs

post.description:
The Global PAM subset service allows a user to create a subset of an
existing Global PAM for computations

202.description: An atom for the gridset that was just posted

get.description:
The gridset endpoint provides a service for querying Lifemapper 
gridsets that match a set of query parameters

200.description: Returns a list of grid sets atoms

get.description:
The grid sets endpoint provides a service counting how many Lifemapper 
grid sets match a set of query parameters.

200.description: The number of grid sets that match the specified criteria

get.description: The grid set service endpoint returns a specific grid set

200.description: Returns a grid set object

get.description:
The matrix endpoint for a grid set provides a servic for querying 
Lifemapper matrices that match a set of query parameters

200.description: Returns a list of matrix atoms

get.description:
The matrix endpoint for a grid set provides a service for querying 
Lifemapper matrices that match a set of query parameters

200.description: Returns the number of matching matrices

get.description:
The matrix endpoint for a grid set provides a service for retrieving a  
Lifemapper matrix

200.description: Returns a matrix

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to access a matrix

404.description: Error status thrown when the requested matrix was not found

get.description:
The matrix endpoint for a grid set provides a service for listing 
matrix columns

200.description: Returns a matrix column atom list

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to access a matrix

404.description: Error status thrown when the requested matrix was not found

get.summary: Get a list of biogeographic hypothesis matrices for this gridset

200.description: A list of biogeogrpahic hypothesis matrix objects

403.description: Error status returned when the user does not have permission to access a matrix

404.description: Error status returned when the requested matrix does not exist

post.summary: Post a set of new biogeographic hypotheses

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Hypothesis POST body

200.description: A list of posted biogeogrpahic hypothesis matrix objects

400.description: Error status returned when there is a problem with user input

get.summary: Gets the specified biogeographic hypothesis matrix

403.description: Error status returned when the user does not have permission to access the data

404.description: Error status returned when the requested matrix does not exist

get.summary: Get the tree associated with this gridset

200.description: The tree in the specified format

403.description: Error status returned when the user does not have permission to access a tree

404.description: Error status returned when the requested tree does not exist

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Tree POST body

400.description: Error status returned when there is a problem with user input

delete.summary: Delete a tree that you own

204.description: An OK message that the tree was deleted

403.description: Error status returned when the user does not have permission to delete a tree

404.description: Error status returned when the requested tree does not exist

post.summary: Adds the specified phylogenetic tree to the gridset

400.description: Error status returned when there is a problem with user input

403.description: Error status returned when the user does not have permission to access a tree

404.description: Error status returned when the requested tree does not exist

get.description:
The layers endpoint provides a service for querying Lifemapper layers
that match a set of query parameters.

200.description: A list of layers that match the specified criteria

parameters.name: epsgCode
parameters.description: The EPSG code for the layer

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A short name for the layer

parameters.name: isCategorical
parameters.description: An indicator if this layer is categorical or not (1=yes, 0=no)

parameters.name: envLayerTypeId
parameters.description: The type code id for this layer

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Additional metadata to add to the layer

parameters.name: envLayerType
parameters.description: The type code for this layer

parameters.name: valUnits
parameters.description: The units for the values in each cell (such as degreesCelsius)

parameters.name: gcmCode
parameters.description: GCM

parameters.name: alternatePredictionCode
parameters.description: Alternate prediction code

parameters.name: dateCode
parameters.description: Date code

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The layer content as a file

400.description: Error status thrown when there is a problem with user inputs

get.description:
The layers endpoint provides a service counting how many Lifemapper 
layers match a set of query parameters.

200.description: The number of layers that match the specified criteria
Layer object in specified format

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to retrieve a layer

404.description: Error status thrown when the layer was not found

delete.summary: Delete a layer that you own

204.description: Returns an OK response that a layer is deleted

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to delete a layer

404.description: Error status thrown when the layer was not found

get.summary: Get a list of occurrence sets that match your criteria

200.description: A list of occurrence sets that match your criteria

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A boom request post body

202.description: An atom for the posted grid set

400.description: Error status returned when there is a problem with user inputs

get.summary: Get a count of occurrence layers that match your criteria

200.description: A count of occurrence sets that match your criteria

get.summary: Get an occurrence set in the specified format

200.description: An occurrence set in the specified format

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to access the occurrence layer

404.description: Error status thrown when the requested occurrence layer does not exist

delete.summary: Delete an occurrence set you own

204.description: OK message that an occurrence set was deleted

403.description: Error status thrown when the user does not have permission to delete the occurrence layer

404.description: Error status thrown when the requested occurrence layer does not exist

get.summary: Get a list of projections that match your criteria

200.description: A list of projections

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: A projection(s) request post body

202.description: An atom for the posted grid set

400.description: Error status returned when there is a problem with user inputs

get.summary: Get a count of projections that match your criteria

200.description: A count of items matching the criteria
Get a projection in the format you specify

403.description: Error status raised when the user does not have permission to access a SDM projection object

404.description: Error status raised when the SDM projection object requested was not found

delete.summary: Delete a projection that you own

204.description: OK Message that a projection was deleted

403.description: Error status raised when the user does not have permission to delete a SDM projection object

404.description: Error status raised when the SDM projection object requested was not found

post.summary: Post a new data set for a user

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the file / package to be stored

parameters.name: uploadType
parameters.description: The type of data being uploaded

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The data posted as a file

202.description: A small JSON chunk indicating the data was posted

400.description: Error status returned when there is a problem with user input

409.description: Post failed due to duplicate name

epsg.description: The EPSG code of the object

modificationTime.description: The date / time this object was last modified

url.description: A URL for more information about this object

statusModTime.description: The date / time this object was last modified
The date / time this object was last modified
The date / time this object was last modified
The date / time this object was last modified

BoomHypotheses.description: Biogeographic hypotheses specification for use with MCPA

hypotheses_package_name.description: The name of the previously uploaded hypothesis package

BoomOccurrenceSet.description:
Multiple occurrence set specification either via occurrence set ids or
generated by processing a CSV file

points_filename.description: This is the name of a previously uploaded file in the user space

BoomPAMStats.description:
Including this option will generate PAM stats for each of the PAMs 
produced in the BOOM workflow.

BoomPOST.description:
The projection POST object is flexible in that you can specify one or
more projections with a single request.  An SDM model is created, but not
returned, for every algorithm / occurrence set / model scenario
combination.  An SDM projection object is created for every algorithm /
occurrence set / model scenario / projection scenario combination

tree.description: Specify the tree to use for this request by id

tree_file_name.description: The file name of the tree that was uploaded

model_scenario.description: Pick one of the options. Only scenario id is enabled now

BoomSDMs.description: This section will specify how to post multiple SDMs in one fell swoop

hull_region_intersect_mask.description:
This is the only intersect method currently available.  If specified,
it will intersect a convex hull around the occurrence points with an
ecoregions layer to create a mask

buffer.description: The buffer, in map units, to use around the points

region.description: Layer name in the scenario package to use for ecoregion

scenarioCode.description: The code to use for the scenario

localId.description:
This identifier can be used within this document to reference this 
newly create shapegrid

compressedPAV.description: Run-length encoded version of the PAV

PathBioGeoId.name: biogeoId
PathBioGeoId.description: The id of the biogeographic matrix to use

PathGridsetId.name: gridsetId
PathGridsetId.description: The id of the grid set to use

PathLayerId.name: layerId
PathLayerId.description: The id of the layer to use

PathMatrixId.name: matrixId
PathMatrixId.description: The id of the matrix to use

PathMatrixColumnId.name: matrixColumnId
PathMatrixColumnId.description: The id of the matrix column to use

PathOccurrenceSetId.name: occurrenceSetId
PathOccurrenceSetId.description: The id of the occurrence set to use

PathScenarioPackageId.name: scenarioPackageId
PathScenarioPackageId.description: The id of the scenario package

AfterStatus.name: afterStatus
AfterStatus.description: Return items with a status greater than this value

AfterTime.name: afterTime
AfterTime.description: Return experiments modified after this time

AlgorithmCode.name: algorithmCode
AlgorithmCode.description: Return experiments that were built using this algorithm

ArchiveNameReq.name: archiveName
ArchiveNameReq.description: The name for the new archive grid set created

BBox.name: bbox
BBox.description: A bounding box in the form minx,miny,maxx,maxy to use for spatial queries

BeforeStatus.name: beforeStatus
BeforeStatus.description: Return items with a status less than this value

BeforeTime.name: beforeTime
BeforeTime.description: Return experiments modified before this time

CellSides.name: cellSides
CellSides.description: Count or list shapegrids that have this many sides per cell (4 - square, 6 - hexagon)

CellSize.name: cellSize
CellSize.description: Count or list shapegrids that have cells of this size (in units of shapegrid)

DisplayName.name: displayName
DisplayName.description: Return experiments that have occurrence sets with a display name like this

EnvCode.name: envCode
EnvCode.description: Return items with this env code

EPSG.name: epsgCode
EPSG.description: Return experiments built using this EPSG code

GridSetId.name: gridSetId
GridSetId.description: Only return items in this grid set

GridSetIdReq.name: gridSetId
GridSetIdReq.description: Subset items from this grid set

HasBranchLengths.name: hasBranchLengths
HasBranchLengths.description: If this is 1, count or list trees with branch lengths

IsBinary.name: isBinary
IsBinary.description: If this is 1, count or list binary trees

IsUltrametric.name: isUltrametric
IsUltrametric.description: If this is 1, count or list ultrametric trees

Limit.name: limit
Limit.description: The maximum number of records to return

MatrixType.name: matrixType
MatrixType.description:
Integer code of the matrix type to list or count.  
PAM - 1, GRIM - 2, BIOGEO - 3, Rolling PAM - 10,  Padded PAM - 101, 
MCPA Output - 201

MetaString.name: metaString
MetaString.description: If provided, list or count trees with this meta string

ModelScenarioCode.name: mdlScenCode
ModelScenarioCode.description: Only return items built with this modeling scenario

ModelScenarioId.name: mdlScenId
ModelScenarioId.description: Only return items built with this modeling scenario

MinimumNumberOfPoints.name: minimumNumberOfPoints
MinimumNumberOfPoints.description: Only return occurrence sets with at least this number of points

OccurrenceSetId.name: occurrenceSetId
OccurrenceSetId.description: Return experiments built using this occurrence set

Offset.name: offset
Offset.description: A number of records to skip before beginning return

PointMax.name: pointMax
PointMax.description: Only return PAVs build from occurrence sets with less than or this many points

PointMin.name: pointMin
PointMin.description: Only return PAVs build from occurrence sets with at least this many points

ProjectScenarioCode.name: prjScenCode
ProjectScenarioCode.description: Only return items built with this SDM projection scenario

ProjectScenarioId.name: prjScenId
ProjectScenarioId.description: Only return items built with this SDM projection scenario

ScenarioCode.name: scenarioCode
ScenarioCode.description: Return objects thatare in or used this scenario

ScenarioId.name: scenarioId
ScenarioId.description: Return objects thatare in or used this scenario

ShapegridId.name: shapegridId
ShapegridId.description: The id of a shapegrid to use for query

Status.name: status
Status.description: If provided, only return items with the status indicated (see before and after status)

TaxonClass.name: taxonClass
TaxonClass.description: Limit the Global PAM results to only those in this class

TaxonFamily.name: taxonFamily
TaxonFamily.description: Limit the Global PAM results to only those in this family

TaxonGenus.name: taxonGenus
TaxonGenus.description: Limit the Global PAM results to only those in this genus

TaxonKingdom.name: taxonKingdom
TaxonKingdom.description: Limit the Global PAM results to only those in this kingdom

TaxonOrder.name: taxonOrder
TaxonOrder.description: Limit the Global PAM results to only those in this order

TaxonPhylum.name: taxonPhylum
TaxonPhylum.description: Limit the Global PAM results to only those in this phylum

TaxonSpecies.name: taxonSpecies
TaxonSpecies.description: Limit the Global PAM results to only those with this species name (without genus)

TreeName.name: treeName
TreeName.description: If provided, return or count trees with this name

UrlUser.name: user
UrlUser.description: If this is 'public' return public objects, if it is 'anon', return anonymous objects, else return user objects
